It was our first time in Paris and we had no problems getting to transport, cafe's, restaurants/shops - all nearby and easy walking distance. Based on our experience, we honestly have no negatives to provide here. The L's are excellent hosts and we highly recommend this apartment to all.

reviews.name: Arlene
reviews.text: The apartment was even better than we had expected -- the view spectacular, the location ideal, and the hosts very helpful! We could not have asked for a nicer place to stay for our 25th wedding anniversary trip to Paris and would highly recommend this apartment to anyone! Thank you again to both Charles and Marie!

reviews.name: Mike
reviews.text: Amazing view and location, and the hosts were great. Thank you!

reviews.name: JoAnne
reviews.text: This apartment was wonderful! The owner's mother who manages the place was gracious and helpful. A great location with a most wonderful view. I would eagerly rent the place again . A++++

reviews.name: Lisa
reviews.text: Incredible...and what a lovely hostess...Could not have been a better location. This was the fIrst trip to Paris for my daughter and grandaughter and the memories made will last us a lifetime. Breakfast on the balcony, watching the twinkling lights on the Eiffel Tower...absolutely supreme! Lisa

reviews.name: Alex
reviews.text: The apartment is amazing. Big, great location, very confortable and well equiped. The beds are very good to sleep after a day walking. The view is something else. Have your private view of the eiffel tower is speechless. Charlie and Marie are great hosts and make everithing to assure the best experience during your stay. They are really nice people and you feel very secure before and while you are staying. I've never rented an apartment for vacation before, so i was a little afraid. But the real experience prove even better of what i was expecting. Stay in paris, in charlie's apartment, give paris a new look and provided a new experience. In the end, the only bad thing was to go away. My wife kept insisting to change our plans and stay more time. If you are looking an apartment, this one must be your choice! Stop looking!

reviews.name: Semion
reviews.text: Wonderful apartment,great location,when we come back to Paris we would love to stay here again.

reviews.name: Olga
reviews.text: We arrived after a long trip from Australia, and could not have had a warmer welcome than the one Marie gave us. This beautiful French lady greeted us as if we were family. Marie showed us through the apartment, had instructions manuals for everything, from bus routes to restaurants, to operating wi-fi etc.... And of course, a beautiful bunch of roses on the table, a bottle of champagne and in the fridge a quiche for our first dinner in Paris. Perfect!! The apartment has everything needed for a very comfortable stay. From a very parisien decor to a very good bed in the master room as well as a comfortable sofa bed which was perfect for our 17 year old. Plenty hot water. Everything worked perfectly. Really appreciated coming home late at night to a nicely heated apartment with such postcard views. It is so central we actually nearly walked everywhere. But the metro is just 5 min walk, the bus 1 min walk. There are Cafes, restaurants, pattisseries, boulangeries, convenience shops just outside the door. Of course, most unique of all, is the view....I have taken hundred of photos of the Eiffel Tower, day, night, sunrise, sunset, while half hidden by mist, in the rain, during a storm all from the balcony, and every single one deserving to stay in my album. Not deleting any. Amazing view.....thank you Charles and Marie for making it available to travelers. We will come back, and we could not imagine staying anywhere else! A bientot!

reviews.name: Don
reviews.text: In our wildest dreams we did not anticipate how perfect this stay in Paris would be. The info. provided by Charles=Henri, the apartment, the care taken to make our stay so memorable.... all brilliant, We have already told 4 friends who intend to book it next year. no more 5 star hotels for us if this is the quality air bnb can offer.

reviews.name: Rebekah
reviews.text: Words cannot describe how extraordinary this apartment is. The location, the views, the amenities, the comfy bed, the bottle of champagne waiting for you upon arrival. This is Paris at its best. You could stay in a hotel, but I would highly recommend this apartment instead. Charles and Marie are beyond hospitable. They are helpful, thoughtful, gracious, and very responsive. Again, I'm not even sure we could put a price on the experience. If we ever return to Paris, this is where we will stay.

reviews.name: Torhild
reviews.text: This place in pure magic! Marias warm welcome and helpfullness, the apartment is lovely and the view is stunning. I could have spent the hole stay in Paris in the apartment! - just watching the view. Paris in rain...we really did not mind... There is no way anyone can be disapointed in this wonderful place!

reviews.name: Steve
reviews.text: Charles, Our first experience in Paris was very memorable while staying at Charles place. The view from his apartment was exquisite. Marie (Charles mother) warmly greeted us during our arrival with a ready made flat that was perfect for the four of us. Accommodations included fresh breakfast foods and Parisian coffee. We enjoyed the red book of recommendations and found ourselves being right at home after our long days of seeing the sights of Paris. We used the easily accessible metro and bus lines. The restaurants in the area are all very good. I would highly recommend this flat for your vacation stay in Paris.

reviews.name: Michael
reviews.text: What an amazing apartment! Bright and sunny with amazing views of the beautiful city of Paris. You are so close to the Eiffel Tower that it feels as if you can touch it. Charles' description of the apartment here on AirBnB is perfectly accurate. The apartment is beautifully furnished and the kitchen is very well stocked with every cooking utensil you could need. Our favorite spot was the terrace where we enjoyed many breakfasts and cocktails. Marie gave us a very warm welcome on the morning of our arrival and gave us a detailed tour of the apartment, explained how to use everything and then followed up the next day to make sure everything was OK. Marie was great - providing us with email instructions and text messages. We all felt instantly at home in the apartment and it was a great way to experience Paris as a Parisian. Thank you Charles and Marie for your hospitality, I hope to return soon!

reviews.name: Meribeth
reviews.text: What a fantastic apartment! The photos do not do it justice. Charles' mother greeted us and was very kind and full of useful information. The location was very convenient, close to the metro, bus routes and the train to Versailles. Rue Cler is a very easy walk away. The view of the Eiffel Tower is indeed a highlight! Next time we come back to Paris, we definitley hope to stay here again.

reviews.name: Harold
reviews.text: This is my 3rd time renting an apartment in Paris and the saying that the third time is a charm is so very true here. The apartment was everything we expected and more. The location could not be any better. The apartment had everything you could ever use. It was a truly wonderful experience having this apartment in Paris. Charles and his mother were as gracious as anybody could be. Charles knew it was my birthday and had a very special bottle of Armagnac waiting for me as a gift. I highly recommend this rental for all who are looking to stay in paris.

reviews.name: Jennifur
reviews.text: Our family of four just returned from a week long visit to Paris. We were thrilled with our visit and already miss our view. When visiting a city, it is great to have a constant landmark guiding your travels and the Eiffel Tower fills that role nicely. Wherever we were, we would always comment that "our" apartment was "there." Marie met us at the apartment and provided information ahead of time to enhance our visit. The view is stunning and the hourly blinking of the tower was met with joy by our children (and us as well!) We really appreciate the kindness and generosity of the hosts.

reviews.name: Dustin
reviews.text: WOW! What an apartment! The Eiffel Tower literally looms over you as you stand on the balcony, sit in the living room or lay in bed. You have to see it to believe it as the pictures cannot do it justice. Charles' mother had champagne, Perrier and chocolates laid out for us when we arrived and was always available if we needed anything. Just an unbelievable host. From the apartment we walked to the Louvre, Musee D'Orsay, Le Cordon Bleu Cooking School, Notre Dame and of course the Eiffel Tower. It is such a great location that you can just grab a map and walk to many of the main sites Paris has to offer. We have absolutely no complaints as everything was above and beyond our wildest expectations. Thanks Charles for the amazing apartment and whenever we go back to Paris this is wear we will stay. We are also recommending this apartment to all of our friends and family.

reviews.name: Chenchen
reviews.text: Me and my sister`s family stayed in Charles` place for a week for or Chinese New Year. The place is astonishingly wonderful. Apart from amazing view of Eiffel Tower, the apartment is tidy, clean and cozy. At night, we enjoyed every dinner with the beautiful view of Eiffel Tower.Marie is such a nice and helpful lady. She left drink and snack for us for our New Year. She was always willing to help no matter how late it was and always asked if we needed help. we had such a wonderful time there. Thank you so much. merci beaucoup. 我和我姐姐一家在charles的公寓住了一个礼拜为过春节。公寓地段非常好,早餐和晚餐都有铁塔相伴。公寓也整洁干净。Charles的妈妈Marie非常热情好客。她随时都准备帮助我们不管多晚,也会随时联系问我们需不需要帮忙。非常温暖。我们度过了一个愉快的春节。非常感激。Merci beaucoup.

reviews.name: Brett
reviews.text: Wow - what an amazing apartment and location , communication , check in , beds , showers were all fantastic. We have travelled around Europe for the last eight weeks and stayed at 8 airbnb places ad this was the best. If you are staying in Paris - stay here !

reviews.name: Steve
reviews.text: The apartment was wonderful, clean and modern with the great view as advertised. We were close to restaurants, shops and the subway. Marie, Charles' mother, was extremely helpful with getting us settled in. We hated to leave!

reviews.name: Jamieson
reviews.text: Beautiful views in a nice, quite area. It was magical to see the Eiffel Tower sparkle from our bed each evening (though the curtains could keep the light out if desired). The Christmas Eve key swap was a bit tricky, but Charles and his mom made sure we were able to get in even with a late arrival. We were so happy with our reservation, and we hope to be back again!

reviews.name: Fitri
reviews.text: Beautiful apartment that fit my family (2 adult and 2 child) perfectly, situated in a very secure building with lift. It is very easy to find; facing Champs De Mars with the Eiffel Tower to the left. Fantastic shops all around with many supermarkets along your way to the RER which was just 5 mins away. Bus stop is just in front of the building too. Apartment was very clean with all the appliance working fine. We made use of the very new fridge, washing machine, dryer and dish washer throughout our stay without any glitches. All necessary washing liquid / detergent was also available. Strong wifi allows us to plan our itinerary when we were there and the heater kept us warm and toasty in the cold December. As Charles was away, we were greeted by his mom, Marie, a very nice and helpful lady. Communication with her, via email, went very well before we arrive and even while we were there. She recommended a good shop for us to buy a new luggage and help obtain information on transfer cost to Disneyland. Oh, did we mention the view? The eiffel tower was the last thing we see everytime we go to bed during our stay. The huge mirror in the living area, where our children slept on the comfy sofa bed, allowed them to share the same experience. We enjoyed having breakfast in the kitchen with the tower looking down on us. Excellent stay! Will definitely come back! Highly recommended!

reviews.name: Anita
reviews.text: My stay at this apartment was absolutely brilliant. Charles and his mother Marie, were the most amazing hosts - from before we arrived until the moment we left. This was my first time using this site and I feel so blessed to have found such an incredible place with such trustworthy hosts. There are so many apartments listed for Paris, but they are apartments you can find anywhere in the world. The spectacular view and wonderful facilities of this apartment ensures that you always remember that you are in the stunning Paris. You don't want to miss any opportunity to have to stay here - I promise you, you won't regret it! Memories for a lifetime.

reviews.name: Annie
reviews.text: We did enjoy our stay in Charles’s apartment, with excellent view of la Tour Eiffel and your friendly, enthusiastic greetings and concerns throughout our stay. We just regret not to stay longer ! On y reviendra à bientôt !

reviews.name: Giancarlo
reviews.text: Charles responded very quickly to all our communication. He arranged for his mother to receive us at the apartment, and everything worked smoothly. Both Charles and his mother were very attentive and went out of their way to make sure we were comfortable. The apartment is great. Its in a modern building, and has a large elevator (for Paris). Kitchen is ample and well equipped. The bathroom has an American style shower with curtain (not the French style open tub/shower). My brother (6'4") slept in the convertible sofa comfortably. Location is also very convenient. There is a small supermarket one block away, and very good restaurants in the area. Several bus lines pass through the Champ de Mars, and three metro stations are very close by. Definitely recommended.

reviews.name: Matt
reviews.text: My boyfriend and I spent a lovely week at Charles’s apartment in Paris. The apartment is spacious, clean, well outfitted, and the view is simply amazing. Since the building is right on the Champ de Mars, you can gaze all the way across the city to Sacre Coeur and the Eiffel Tower is right outside your window (we loved watching it sparkle at night as we lay in bed or relaxed on the balcony). Marie, Charles’s mother, met us when we arrived and she could not have been more kind, she also checked in with us throughout the week to see how we were doing and if we needed anything. There are many dining options in the area and easy access to the RER, Metro, and buses to get you anywhere in the city you’d like to go. We could not recommend this apartment more highly. Thank you, Charles and Marie for an amazing stay in Paris!

reviews.name: David
reviews.text: It was a pleasure getting to use Charles’ apartment during our week in Paris. We were two couples from Oregon visiting Paris for a few days this fall. The location of the apartment was ideal, with easy access to the metro, buses, restaurants, shops and a very short walk from the Eiffel Tower. While Charles was traveling on business, his mother Marie was there to receive us. She quickly showed us around the apartment as well as had picked up a few things we needed in advance of our arrival. The apartment has all of the conveniences one needs for a good visit to Paris. A well-furnished kitchen, laundry, utensils and very clean linens. Charles had left lots of instructions and information on things to do and how to get around. The elevator turned the 9th. floor into a great advantage with no drawbacks. The view was magnificent and so were the people we rented from. Marie was always accessible and willing to help. Even in the last day, when we weren’t able to get a taxi, she was kind enough to call and book one for us. This will definitely be where we’ll stay during our next visit to Paris.

reviews.name: Lisa
reviews.text: Classy! We had ten fabulous days of music, museums, starry nights and Eiffel tower lights. From the balcony, the spaciousness of the skyline and view was divine, after a long day walking the streets of Paris, as was dining on wine and cheese overlooking the trees at sunset. Truly magical. Famed Bus 69 begins its scenic route practically at our doorstep, and delivered us to many popular destinations while enjoying the city sights above ground. We'll return soon! Thanks Charles!

reviews.name: Jeffrey And Jacqueline
reviews.text: Wow!!! The description for Charles' apt was totally accurate. It was exceptional and the view was even more stunning than the pictures. My fiancé and I went to Paris to celebrate our engagement and this was the perfect space for a week in the city. The apartment is just over a block away from the Eiffel Tower. The metro was less than a five minute walk and the residential area was full of dinning options. The building is not much to look at from the outside, but was clean, safe, and quiet. The only thing better than the location and aesthetics of the apartment was Charles as the owner. He went above and beyond to make our stay fantastic. The aptment was clean, all the linens were new, and were greeted by fresh flowers and wine. Between Charles and his very charming mother, any need we had (which were few) was attended to promptly and in a spirit of hospitality. The next time we are in Paris we know where we will stay. You can't go wrong staying here.
